room_title: Escape room "Game of Pirates" by Riddle in Mashpee
room_description: In 1717, a Nor’easter off the town of Wellfleet on Cape Cod sank the pirate ship Whydah, her 142 crew members and 4 tons of silver and gold. Rumors of Captain “Black Sam” Bellamy’s death swirled but some believed that he survived the wreck by swimming to a nearby ship, boarding and overtaking it. He was said to have located and recovered several tons of the Whydah’s treasure safely storing it aboard his new ship. You have one shot and 60 minutes at finding the treasure and becoming a multimillionaire!
